name: Dosa
description: A crispy and savory South Indian pancake made with fermented rice and lentil batter.

name: Idli
description: A soft and fluffy South Indian steamed rice cake made with fermented rice and lentil batter.

name: Vada
description: A deep-fried South Indian savory doughnut made with lentil batter and spices.

name: Pongal
description: A hearty and comforting South Indian rice and lentil porridge made with cumin, pepper, and ghee.

name: Sambar
description: A tangy and spicy South Indian lentil soup made with vegetables and tamarind.

name: Rasam
description: A tangy and spicy South Indian soup made with tomatoes, tamarind, and spices.

name: Avial
description: A flavorful and colorful South Indian vegetable stew made with coconut and yogurt.

name: Thalapakattu Biryani
description: A spicy and aromatic South Indian rice dish made with basmati rice, meat, and spices.

name: Kuzhi Paniyaram
description: A soft and fluffy South Indian dumpling made with fermented rice and lentil batter.

name: Parotta
description: A flaky and layered South Indian flatbread made with all-purpose flour and ghee.
